EmailTemplate.subject: Trousers for Girls Y5 - Y7 Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We are planning on placing the order for winter trousers for girls (Year 5-7) shortly but please note that their readiness will depend on the number of trousers ordered and most likely such order will be ready during the first 2 weeks of November. These clothing items are produced locally and therefore ordered individually. The design is similar to the existing boys' trousers but adjusted to fit girls, you can see an example in the Uniform shop. The cost of one pair of trousers will be around 2000 rubles (TBC). If you are interested in purchasing them for your child please email Magomet Gamurziev at magomet.gamurziev@internationalschool.ru by Friday, September 19th, and indicate the student name, class, campus and number of pairs you would like to order (limited to 2 pairs per student). Thank you.
Kind regards,
Magomet Gamurziev
Services / Resources Manager The International School of Moscow World Class Education
